name: Squarzi
description:
Squarzi was originally just a game I made to tinker with audio filters but it turned out to be a little fun, so here you have it, in early access, buy now and get the game's later updates!

You can play the demo (Web Demo) on http://gamejolt.com/games/puzzle/squarzi/42895/ - Unity Web Player required!

Thank you teknoaxe, and Ruben K (youtube) for the royalty free dubstep tracks :)

https://www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe

http://www.youtube.com/user/RubbKTube

Feel free to email me demetryromanowski@gmail.com if you have any questions or concerns

Follow Me on Twitter @epicjavaguy :D
